SEARCH
Package dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.logger

Interface LoggerAdapter<P,L>

Type Parameters:
P - platform audience type (Player, ServerPlayerEntity, etc.)
L - prefixed logger implementation type
public interface LoggerAdapter<P,L>
Shared logger adapter API for platform-specific wrappers.
